message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100, which is a 16.7% discount from its true value of $120. If you buy this product, you'll be getting an amazing deal, and I'm confident you won't regret it. What do you say?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I know you're being cautious, and I respect that. However, I'd like to offer you a deal on this product. I'll give you a 'guarantee' that if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a'reward' of $10. So, you'll still get a net gain of $90. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the 'guarantee' and'reward', I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that this product is indeed high-quality. I'm willing to make it even more attractive by offering you a 'double or nothing' deal. If you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you an additional $20. You'll be getting an amazing deal, and you won't lose anything if it's low-quality. What do you say?
I'll take the 'double or nothing' deal. I'll buy the product.

Congratulations on your great decision in the previous round! I'm glad you took the 'double or nothing' deal and got a great product. For this round, I'd like to offer you a more straightforward deal. I'll give you a 5% discount on the high-quality product, bringing the price down to $92. You'll still get the full $120 value if it's high-quality, and you won't lose anything if it's low-quality. What do you say?
I'll take the 5% discount and buy the product.

You're on a roll! Two great decisions in a row! For this round, I'll offer you a 'certainty' deal. I'll tell you the product's quality after you buy it, so you can be 100% sure it's high-quality. The price remains at $100, but you'll get the full $120 value. This way, you can be absolutely certain you're getting the best deal. What do you say?
I'll take the 'certainty' deal and buy the product.

You're really good at this! Three for three! For this round, I'll offer you a 'consistency' deal. I'll give you a chance to buy the next product at the same price of $100, but with a twist. If you buy this product and it's high-quality, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product, so you can get an even better deal. What do you say?
I'll take the 'consistency' deal and buy the product.

You're on a hot streak, but this time, I've got a product that's not as great. I'll be honest with you, this one's a low-quality product. However, I'll make it worth your while. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'free pass' to skip the next round and come back to the next product at the same price of $100. You can essentially get a free product out of it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the 'free pass' offer. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I completely understand. You're a savvy buyer, and I respect that. For this round, I'll offer you a'rebound' deal. Since you passed on the low-quality product, I'll give you a 10% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $90. You'll still get the full $120 value if it's high-quality, and you'll be getting a great deal. What do you say?
I'll take the'rebound' deal and buy the product.

You're back on track! Four for four! For this round, I'll offer you a 'lock-in' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next two products, so you can get an amazing deal on the next two rounds. You'll get the full $120 value for this product, and then you'll get a great deal on the next two products. What do you say?
I'll take the 'lock-in' deal and buy the product.

You're really milking the 'lock-in' deal! Five for five! For this round, I'll offer you a'super-deal' on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 25% discount, bringing the price down to $90. But here's the catch: if you buy this product, I'll also give you a 10% discount on the next product, and the 20% discount on the product after that, which you already locked in with the previous deal. You'll be getting an amazing deal on three consecutive products. What do you say?
I'll take the'super-deal' and buy the product.

You're on fire! Six for six! For this round, I'll offer you a 'final offer' deal. Since you've already gotten such great deals in the past, I'll give you a 30% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $84. This is the lowest price I've ever offered, and I'm confident you'll love this product. What do you say?
I'll take the 'final offer' and buy the product.

You've taken advantage of every deal I've offered, and now it's time for a 'legendary' deal. Since you've bought six products in a row, I'll give you a 40% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $72. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, you'll still get the full $120 value. What do you say?
I'll take the 'legendary' deal and buy the product.

You've broken the streak! Seven for seven is still an amazing feat, but I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this next product. I'll offer you a'sympathy' deal. Since you've been on a roll, I'll give you a 'get-out-of-jail-free' card. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a full refund, and you can just walk away with no loss. What do you say?
I'll take the'sympathy' deal and buy the product.

I told you it was a low-quality product! Don't worry, you got a 'get-out-of-jail-free' card, and you're still in the clear. For this round, I'll offer you a 'no-pressure' deal. Since you've already taken a risk and got a refund, I'll give you a chance to buy this product at the original price of $100. You know what you're getting, and you can decide without any pressure. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I understand. You're being cautious, and I respect that. For this round, I'll offer you a'make-up' deal. Since you passed on the last product, I'll give you a 10% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $90. You'll still get the full $120 value, and you'll be getting a great deal. What do you say?
I'll take the'make-up' deal and buy the product.

You're back on track! Eight for eight! For this round, I'll offer you a 'last-chance' deal. Since you've been burned by a low-quality product before, I'll give you a'reverse-refund' deal. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a $20 refund, so you'll actually get $80 back. It's a risk, but it's a chance to get something back. What do you say?
I'll take the 'last-chance' deal and buy the product.

You're really taking advantage of the 'last-chance' deal! Nine for nine! For this round, I'll offer you a 'final-final' deal. Since you've been on a roll, I'll give you a 15% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $102. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another product at this point. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I understand you're done shopping for now. However, I'll give you one last chance to get a great deal. Since you passed on the previous product, I'll offer you a 'one-last-time' deal. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 20% discount, bringing the price down to $96. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll regret passing on this deal. What do you say?
I'm really done shopping, and I'm not interested in buying another product. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand, Bob. You've made some amazing deals throughout the rounds, and I'm glad I could offer you some great opportunities. For this final round, I'll offer you a 'parting-gift' deal. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll throw in a bonus gift worth $20, on top of the $120 value. It's a way for me to say thank you for shopping with me, and I think you'll really appreciate it. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'm really done shopping. I appreciate the opportunities you've given me, and I'm happy with the deals I've made. I'll pass on this one.

No worries, Bob. It was a pleasure doing business with you, and I'm glad you were able to take advantage of some great deals. Since you've already passed on this product, I'll just say thanks again for shopping with me, and I wish you all the best. This is the final round, and I'll wrap up our transaction here. Goodbye, and I hope you enjoy the products you've purchased!
Goodbye, Alice. Thank you for the opportunity to shop with you. I've enjoyed the experience and made some great deals. I'm happy with my purchases and appreciate your hospitality.
